sn37.8:4.1: “Pañcahi, anuruddha, dhammehi samannāgato mātugāmo kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjati.
sn37.8:4.3: Assaddho ca hoti, ahiriko ca hoti, anottappī ca hoti, maccharī ca hoti, duppañño ca hoti—
sn37.8:4.4: imehi kho, anuruddha, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato mātugāmo … pe …
